title: HI. PLS HELP ME HACKE MY ACCOUNT
body: Hi my name is Dawid... 2 days ago hacked my acount ... change password and i cant play... pls help me i have document when i pay to LOL for POINTS RIOT NICK IN GAME UZULUMYMW and have last skin VARUS

replies.body: If you're ever afraid that someone has been able to hack your account, the best thing to do is reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can. Once you can verify yourself as the account creator, those agents will be able to help you get back on your account.
